overview: Meet Jessica (Ava Vincent), a sweet beautiful woman with a lot going for her, including a handsome and caring boyfriend. Meet Andy (Steven St. Croix), Jessica's best friend, attractive in his own right, but who seems to be cursed with always being dumped by girls only to be told: 'You're a really nice guy, let's be friends.' Determined to find the woman of his dreams, Andy decides no more Mr. Nice guy, since it seems that most women want dicks and not 'nice' guys for boyfriends and heads out into the world to find his true love. What Andy soon discovers though is that being true to who you are, will lead you in the right direction and where you least expect it, you just might find that true love was right in front of you the whole time. True Love, love can be found in the most unlikely places...
title: True Love
